      Returns:
      a list of LeaderCards, ordered by their IDs

    • createDecksFromJSON

      public static void createDecksFromJSON​(java.util.List<java.util.List<DevelopmentCard>> colorCards, CardColor color)
      Takes in input the List of empty decks of a specific color and the color, reads the cards data from the DevelopmentCards JSON file, then it splits the cards of the specified color into decks based on the cards level. Level 1 cards will be in the first lists of every column. Level 2 cards will be in the middle (second lists of every column). Level 3 cards will be in the third lists of every column. The method is hardcoded to receive cards with levels from 1 to 3.
      Parameters:
      colorCards - specifies which column of the deck is going to be instantiated
      color - specifies the color of the cards of the decks to create

    • restoreGames

      public static java.util.List<PersistenceHandler> restoreGames() throws GameDataNotFoundException
      Restores the persistence handlers of all saved games
      Returns:
      a List of the restored PersistenceHandlers
      Throws:
      GameDataNotFoundException - if one of the games fails to be restored

    • deleteGameData

      public static void deleteGameData​(int gameID) throws GameDataNotFoundException
      Deletes a specific game's save file
      Parameters:
      gameID - the game's PersistenceHandler's (and save file's) Id
      Throws:
      GameDataNotFoundException - if the given Id does not correspond to any save file

    • findFirstFreePersistenceId

      public static int findFirstFreePersistenceId()
      Returns the first available free persistence handler Id
      Returns:
      the first free Id

    • saveGameOnDisk

      public static void saveGameOnDisk​(PersistenceHandler persistenceHandler)
      Saves the game in a JSON file named 'game + id + .json' inside the savedGames folder
      Parameters:
      persistenceHandler - is the game's PersistenceHandler
